text: Angels in the Outfield is a 1951 American family baseball comedy movie directed by Clarence Brown and starring Paul Douglas, Janet Leigh, Keenan Wynn, Donna Corcoran, Lewis Stone, Bruce Bennett, Marvin Kaplan and Ellen Corby. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was remade in 1994 by Walt Disney Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:Movies about angels Category:Movies directed by Clarence Brown Category:MGM movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Baseball movies Category:Movies set in Pittsburgh Category:1950s English-language movies
title: Angels in the Outfield (1951 movie)
